issue_title: [Bug] from_dict 缺少对 created_at/updated_at 字段的类型校验，可能接受非字符串值导致序列化失败

plan.problem_summary: from_dict method uses str() for created_at/updated_at which accepts dict/list/None types that should be rejected
plan.solution_approach: Add isinstance(str) validation for created_at and updated_at similar to text field validation

implementation.summary: Add type validation for created_at/updated_at fields in Todo.from_dict to reject dict/list types that would cause serialization failures.
